questions.text: Do you want to work by yourself or with others?

options.label: Both
options.value: likes to work both with others and alone

questions.text: Are you a physically active person?

options.label: I aim to move as little as possible
Very important! I want to buy a house, car and boat!
Money is not important and is not what makes me happy!

questions.text: How do you solve a problem?

options.label: I ask someone I trust for advice!
options.value: wants input from others when making decitions

options.label: I search for facts and information online and in books
options.value: Proactivly seeks out information by themselves

options.label: I like to figure it our by myself

questions.text: Do you like to take risks?

options.label: I never back down from a challange
Sometimes you have to take risks to win
